system:
note description: "Eiffel Vision item list. Implementation interface." legal: "See notice at end of class." status: "See notice at end of class." keywords: "item, list" date: "$Date: 2012-05-02 22:50:26 -0700 (Wed, 02 May 2012) $" revision: "$Revision: 88680 $"
deferred class ../implementation_interface/ev_item_list_i.xmlEV_ITEM_LIST_I [G -> ../interface/ev_item.xmlEV_ITEM]
inherit ../implementation_interface/ev_dynamic_list_i.xmlEV_DYNAMIC_LIST_I [G] redefine ../implementation_interface/ev_item_list_i.xml#f_interfaceinterface end
feature -- Access
f_item_by_data../implementation_interface/ev_item_list_i.xml#f_item_by_dataitem_by_data (data: FalseANY): detachable like ../implementation_interface/ev_dynamic_list_i.xml#f_itemitem -- First item with data. require data_not_void: data /= Void local c: FalseCURSOR curr_data: detachable like data do c := ../implementation_interface/ev_dynamic_list_i.xml#f_cursorcursor from ../implementation_interface/ev_any_i.xml#f_attached_interfaceattached_interface.../interface/ev_dynamic_list.xml#f_startstart until ../implementation_interface/ev_any_i.xml#f_attached_interfaceattached_interface.Falseafter or Result /= Void loop if attached ../implementation_interface/ev_any_i.xml#f_attached_interfaceattached_interface.../interface/ev_dynamic_list.xml#f_itemitem as l_item then curr_data := l_item.../interface/ev_any.xml#f_datadata if Falseequal (curr_data, data) then Result := l_item end end ../implementation_interface/ev_any_i.xml#f_attached_interfaceattached_interface.../interface/ev_dynamic_list.xml#f_forthforth end ../implementation_interface/ev_dynamic_list_i.xml#f_go_togo_to (c) end
feature {../interface/ev_any.xmlEV_ANY, ../implementation_interface/ev_any_i.xmlEV_ANY_I, ../implementation_interface/ev_item_i.xmlEV_ITEM_I} -- Implementation
f_interface../implementation_interface/ev_item_list_i.xml#f_interfaceinterface: detachable ../interface/ev_item_list.xmlEV_ITEM_LIST [G] note option: stable attribute end
